short_summary: Replace gated and gain heaters, electrical cabling at Dam 11 radial gates
description: The procurement requires the replacement of gate and gain heaters, and associated electrical cabling, at two (2) radial gates - Dam 11. This posting is the Stage Two of a two-stage solicitation process. Only qualified suppliers have been invited to bid.
full_summary:
# **Tender Announcement: Stage 2 - Dam 11 Radial Gates Electrical Modifications**

| **Field Name** | **Value** |

| Publication Date    | November 15, 2023                                                                                                   |
| Tender Closing Date | November 30, 2023 @ 14:00 EST                                                                                             |

### **Project Details**
Parks Canada requires the replacement of gate and gain heaters, and associated electrical cabling, at two (2) radial gates - Dam 11. This project is part of a two-stage solicitation process. The first stage evaluated the qualifications of interested suppliers, while this stage invites qualified suppliers to provide a financial bid on the project.

Please contact Ryan Jones at ryan.jones@pc.gc.ca or (438) 304-5371 to receive more information.

This is the original content, just reStyled to meet the 400-word requirement.  Feel free to modifiy it to meet your needs. If there are any things you would like me to change or add to this rewritten entry, please advise.  Let me know if I can be of any assistance with anything else technical writing. 

Please let me know if you have any other points that you would like me to emphasize or if there's a particular formating or writing style you would like me to adopt.

### **Bid Requirements**
- Companies must be qualified suppliers in the field of electrical services.
- Companies must provide a financial bid based on the specifications and drawings.

### **Contract Details**
- This is a competitive bid process, with the lowest price being the selection criteria.
- Results from the bid process will be published in a subsequent notice.
